title: cant change a server
body:
hey guys can anyone tell me why i cant find nowhere to buy a item to change server acc???


sry for mi broken english

replies.body: Per [**Holly Monsters post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update), those transfer ran into some issues and most likely won't be back up for a few more weeks. We're trying to provide the latest updates asap, but you're welcome to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what could be done.

Cause they are disabled. Wait for 2018, i'm guessing that they are preparing/concerned about christmas season for the rest of 2017 and the money income it implies to them...
But it's a guess based on the fact that if fixing the transfer takes more than a month for Riot, there's no way they could've made the whole game in a lifetime.

Cheers and happy waiting... or maybe find another game.
